org.wtc.eclipse.platform.helpers
Interface IJavaProjectHelper

public interface IJavaProjectHelper

Helper for creating Java projects.

Method Summary
 void addProjectBuildDependency(IUIContext ui, java.lang.String sourceProject, java.lang.String targetProject)
          addProjectBuildDependency - Open the project properties for a given project and add a project dependency to another given project.
 void createProject(IUIContext ui, java.lang.String projectName)
          createProject - Create a simple project with the default location.
 void createProject(IUIContext ui, java.lang.String projectName, boolean separateSourceAndOutput)
          createProject - Create a simple project with the default location and separate source and output folders, if specified.
 void deleteProject(IUIContext ui, java.lang.String projectName)
          deleteProject - Delete the given project from the workspace.
 void deleteProject(IUIContext ui, java.lang.String projectName, boolean deleteContents)
          deleteProject - Delete the given project from the workspace.

                               java.lang.String sourceProject,
                               java.lang.String targetProject)

createProject

void createProject(IUIContext ui,
                   java.lang.String projectName)
createProject - Create a simple project with the default location. Method should wait until the project is created

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
projectName - - Should adhere to project name validation rules (not null, not the empty string, legal characters, etc)

createProject

void createProject(IUIContext ui,
                   java.lang.String projectName,
                   boolean separateSourceAndOutput)
createProject - Create a simple project with the default location and separate source and output folders, if specified. Method should wait until the project is created

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
projectName - - Should adhere to project name validation rules (not null, not the empty string, legal characters, etc)
separateSourceAndOutput - - True to create separate source and output folders

deleteProject

void deleteProject(IUIContext ui,
                   java.lang.String projectName)
deleteProject - Delete the given project from the workspace.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
projectName - - Should adhere to project name validation rules (not null, not the empty string, legal characters, etc)

deleteProject

void deleteProject(IUIContext ui,
                   java.lang.String projectName,
                   boolean deleteContents)
deleteProject - Delete the given project from the workspace.

Parameters:
ui - - Driver for UI generated input
projectName - - Should adhere to project name validation rules (not null, not the empty string, legal characters, etc)
deleteContents - - True if the contents should be deleted, too
